welcomeSubtitle: Match with trusted local cooks who prepare meals around your schedule.
termsAgreement: I agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
verificationDescriptionEmail: Enter the 6-digit code sent to {contact} to secure your profile.
invalidCode: That code did not match. Try again.
learnSupportSubtitle: Tutorials for food safety, packaging, and delivery etiquette.
knowledgeBaseIntro: Use these quick tutorials to feel confident before every order.
knowledgeClientSection1Subtitle: Prep your kitchen before a cook arrives.
knowledgeClientSection1Item1: Clear counter space and wash utensils the cook will use.
knowledgeClientSection1Item2: Keep raw ingredients refrigerated until the cook needs them.
knowledgeClientSection1Item3: Sanitize sinks and high-touch surfaces before and after the session.
knowledgeClientSection2Subtitle: Have containers ready so meals stay fresh.
knowledgeClientSection2Item1: Set out clean, food-safe containers or label what the cook can use.
knowledgeClientSection2Item2: Let the cook know about reheating instructions that work best for you.
knowledgeClientSection2Item3: Date and label leftovers so your household knows what to expect.
knowledgeClientSection3Subtitle: Coordinate with dispatchers for a smooth handoff.
knowledgeClientSection3Item1: Confirm the delivery window in the app and keep your phone nearby.
knowledgeClientSection3Item2: Provide gate codes or drop-off notes ahead of time to avoid delays.
knowledgeClientSection3Item3: Inspect packaging on arrival and report issues through support within 2 hours.
knowledgeSupportFaqCta: Read the full FAQ for policies, allergen guidance, and escalation steps at:
emptyOrders: You have no active orders yet. Start by discovering cooks you love.
offlineFallback: Showing saved recommendations while we reconnect.
